attributes.action: UK goverment recognition for Alan Henning
attributes.additional_details: Given the senseless, brutal murder of British humanitarian aid worker Alan Henning, our UK government should award him a posthumous knighthood for exemplary welfare services to the Syrian people. Each and every one of Alan's British muslim friends and colleagues who joined him on his fateful last trip to Syria should also be awarded British government Honours for their equally kind and selfless humanitarian acts.
